text: This was the first edition of the tournament. Denis Istomin won the title after defeating Reilly Opelka 6–4, 6–2 in the final. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top half=== ===Bottom half=== ==References== *Main Draw *Qualifying Draw Oracle Challenger Series - Chicago - Men's Singles 2018 Men's Singles
